csw.command.javadsl

Class JCommandService

  • java.lang.Object
    • csw.command.javadsl.JCommandService

  • public class JCommandService
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for Java to get the handle of CommandService

      • oneway

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<CommandResponse> oneway(ControlCommand controlCommand,
                                                                      akka.util.Timeout timeout)
        Send a command as a Oneway and get a CommandResponse as a Future. The CommandResponse can be a response of validation (Accepted, Invalid) or a final Response.

        Parameters:
        controlCommand - the ControlCommand payload
        timeout - (undocumented)
        Returns:
        a CommandResponse as a CompletableFuture

      • onewayAndMatch

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<CommandResponse> onewayAndMatch(ControlCommand controlCommand,
                                                                              StateMatcher stateMatcher,
                                                                              akka.util.Timeout timeout)
        Submit a command and match the published state from the component using a StateMatcher. If the match is successful a Completed response is provided as a future. In case of a failure or unmatched state, Error CommandResponse is provided as a Future.

        Parameters:
        controlCommand - the ControlCommand payload.
        stateMatcher - the StateMatcher implementation for matching received state against a demand state.
        timeout - (undocumented)
        Returns:
        a CommandResponse as a CompletableFuture

      • query

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<CommandResponse> query(Id commandRunId,
                                                                     akka.util.Timeout timeout)
        Query for the result of a long running command which was sent as Submit to get a CommandResponse as a Future.

        Parameters:
        commandRunId - the runId of the command for which response is required
        timeout - (undocumented)
        Returns:
        a CommandResponse as a CompletableFuture

      • sCommandService

        public csw.command.scaladsl.CommandService sCommandService()

      • scheduler

        public akka.actor.Scheduler scheduler()

      • submit

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<CommandResponse> submit(ControlCommand controlCommand,
                                                                      akka.util.Timeout timeout)
        Submit a command and get a CommandResponse as a Future. The CommandResponse can be a response of validation (Accepted, Invalid) or a final Response. In case of response as Accepted, final CommandResponse can be obtained by using subscribe API.

        Parameters:
        controlCommand - the ControlCommand payload
        timeout - (undocumented)
        Returns:
        a CommandResponse as a CompletableFuture

      • submitAll

        public akka.stream.javadsl.Source<CommandResponse,akka.NotUsed> submitAll(java.util.Set<ControlCommand> controlCommands,
                                                                          akka.util.Timeout timeout)
        Submit multiple commands and get a Source of CommandResponse for all commands. The CommandResponse can be a response of validation (Accepted, Invalid) or a final Response. In case of response as Accepted, final CommandResponse can be obtained by using subscribe API.

        Parameters:
        controlCommands - the set of ControlCommand payloads
        timeout - (undocumented)
        Returns:
        a Source of CommandResponse as a stream of CommandResponses for all commands

      • submitAllAndGetFinalResponse

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<CommandResponse> submitAllAndGetFinalResponse(java.util.Set<ControlCommand> controlCommands,
                                                                                            akka.util.Timeout timeout)
        Submit multiple commands and get final CommandResponse for all as one CommandResponse. If all the commands were successful, a CommandResponse as CommandResponse.Completed will be returned. If any one of the command fails, an CommandResponse.Error will be returned. For long running commands, it will subscribe for the result of those which were successfully validated as Accepted and get the final CommandResponse.

        Parameters:
        controlCommands - the ControlCommand payload.
        timeout - (undocumented)
        Returns:
        a CommandResponse as a CompletableFuture

      • submitAllAndGetResponse

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<CommandResponse> submitAllAndGetResponse(java.util.Set<ControlCommand> controlCommands,
                                                                                       akka.util.Timeout timeout)
        Submit multiple commands and get one CommandResponse as a Future of CommandResponse for all commands. If all the commands were successful, a CommandResponse as CommandResponse.Completed will be returned. If any one of the command fails, an CommandResponse.Error will be returned.

        Parameters:
        controlCommands - the set of ControlCommand payloads
        timeout - (undocumented)
        Returns:
        CommandResponse.Accepted or CommandResponse.Error CommandResponse as a CompletableFuture.

      • submitAllAndSubscribe

        public akka.stream.javadsl.Source<CommandResponse,akka.NotUsed> submitAllAndSubscribe(java.util.Set<ControlCommand> controlCommands,
                                                                                      akka.util.Timeout timeout)
        Submit multiple commands and get final CommandResponse for all as a stream of CommandResponse. For long running commands, it will subscribe for the result of those which were successfully validated as Accepted and get the final CommandResponse.

        Parameters:
        controlCommands - the ControlCommand payload.
        timeout - (undocumented)
        Returns:
        a Source of CommandResponse as a stream of CommandResponses for all commands

      • submitAndSubscribe

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<CommandResponse> submitAndSubscribe(ControlCommand controlCommand,
                                                                                  akka.util.Timeout timeout)
        Submit a command and Subscribe for the result if it was successfully validated as Accepted to get a final CommandResponse as a Future.

        Parameters:
        controlCommand - the ControlCommand payload.
        timeout - (undocumented)
        Returns:
        a CommandResponse as a CompletableFuture

      • subscribe

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<CommandResponse> subscribe(Id commandRunId,
                                                                         akka.util.Timeout timeout)
        Subscribe for the result of a long running command which was sent as Submit to get a CommandResponse as a Future.

        Parameters:
        commandRunId - the runId of the command for which response is required
        timeout - (undocumented)
        Returns:
        a CommandResponse as a CompletableFuture

      • subscribeCurrentState

        public csw.command.scaladsl.CurrentStateSubscription subscribeCurrentState(java.util.function.Consumer<CurrentState> callback)
        Subscribe to the current state of a component corresponding to the AkkaLocation of the component

        Parameters:
        callback - the action to be applied on the CurrentState element received as a result of subscription
        Returns:
        a CurrentStateSubscription to stop the subscription

      • subscribeOnlyCurrentState

        public csw.command.scaladsl.CurrentStateSubscription subscribeOnlyCurrentState(java.util.Set<StateName> names,
                                                                               java.util.function.Consumer<CurrentState> callback)
        Subscribe to the current state of a component corresponding to the AkkaLocation of the component

        Parameters:
        names - subscribe to only those states which have any of the the provided value for name
        callback - the action to be applied on the CurrentState element received as a result of subscription
        Returns:
        a CurrentStateSubscription to stop the subscription
